thread.title: First look at Stranger Things season 2 Super Bowl ad - and there's something strange in the neighbourhood
thread.title_full: First look at Stranger Things season 2 Super Bowl ad - and there's something strange in the neighbourhood

author: Jo-Anne Rowney
title: First look at Stranger Things season 2 Super Bowl ad - and there's something strange in the neighbourhood
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
If you weren't planning on tuning into the Super Bowl you might just change your mind in a sec. 
Netflix's Stranger Things will air a new teaser during the big Fox sports event. 
If you can't wait until then, EW gave everyone a cheeky look at the commercial featuring Dustin (Gaten Matarazzo), Mike (Finn Wolfhard), and Lucas (Caleb McLaughlin) dressed as Ghostbusters. 
Executive producer Shawn Levy also gave EW a little tease of what's to come: “The Demogorgon was destroyed but evil wasn’t.” 
Make of that what you will. 
The season season kicks off in 1984 - a year after the events of season one - and little has been revealed so far. 
Stranger Things 2 , stars Winona Ryder , David Harbour, Paul Reiser, Sean Astin, Millie Bobby Brown, Noah Schnapp, and Matarazzo, Wolfhard, and McLaughlin. It's set to debut on Netflix later this year. Read More
